patthana16.30:1.1_0: Savitakkasavicāraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.30:2.1_0: Savitakkasavicāraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.30:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa, adhipatiyā ekūnavīsa …pe… purejāte āsevane ekūnavīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
